### Request for Qualifications - North Park Armoury Rehabilitation Phase 2

#### Project Overview

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites contractors to submit a Technical Submission for the North Park Armoury Rehabilitation Phase 2 project, located in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

#### Scope of Work

The project involves the rehabilitation of the north, south, and east elevations of the North Park Armoury, including:

* Heritage preservation and restoration
* Hazardous materials abatement
* Structural upgrades
* Roofing and services upgrades
* Complete interior renovation and fit-up

The North Park Armoury is a federally designated Classified Heritage Building and a National Historic Site, listed in the Halifax Municipal Registry of Heritage Properties.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Submissions will be evaluated based on the established criteria outlined in the Request for Qualifications (RFQ) documents.

#### Important Dates

* Closing date and time for Technical Submissions: 2023-05-09T14:00:00

#### Contracting Information

* Contracting Entity: Defence Construction Canada
* DCC Project Number: IE090919
* Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Construction Cost Limit: $98,000,000

#### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Steve Kennedy
* Contact Email: steve.kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (613) 769-2659

#### Submission Instructions

Firms interested in providing services for this project must submit their Technical Submission through the MERX Electronic Bidding System.

#### Additional Information

Tenderers can obtain contract award results from the DCC website.

#### Regional Information

* Regions of Opportunity: Nova Scotia
* Regions of Delivery: Halifax
